We are making changes to offer you more options! Now rescheduling your flight is easy, with our new Self re-accommodation service. Learn more at: https://t.co/fIQliDBlPZ. This service only applies if your flight was rescheduled by us. #AviancaKeepsOnFlying. https://t.co/kMdYUrOpt3

Learn more about our baggage policies and customization options for your trip here: https://t.co/vaQKheYARf. Follow the recommendations to enjoy all the benefits we offer to make your flight a unique experience. #AviancaKeepsOnFlying https://t.co/m4QDLZJbQm

We have implemented a new re-accommodation service, now you can change your flight by yourself. Learn more at: https://t.co/fIQliDjKrp. Our digital transformation #KeepsOnFlying. This service only applies if your flight was rescheduled by us. https://t.co/vcv9GSt9qw

data.text: Actualmente nuestros canales de atención reciben un gran número de solicitudes, por ello el tiempo de respuesta puede ser mayor de lo habitual. ¡Conoce más opciones para gestionar tus procesos en https://t.co/moqXeLbnmJ: https://t.co/wkF5eA2TQb y #SigueVolando! https://t.co/WuQkgODi8L

¿Te vas para Estados Unidos? El primer paso que debes hacer es revisar nuestra página, ahí te contamos todo lo que debes alistar. Aquí:  https://t.co/IoLSohJaJv.

#CambiandoJuntos. https://t.co/dWjVBn48yi

¡Cuida tu salud! Sigue estos pasos y realiza de forma rápida y segura tu pre-registro obligatorio para ingresar y salir del país en la aplicación Check-Mig. #AviancaSigueVolando https://t.co/0YtUm3Yz2h

We are making changes to offer you more options! Now rescheduling your flight is easy, with our new Self re-accommodation service. Learn more at: https://t.co/fIQliDBlPZ. This service only applies if your flight was rescheduled by us. #AviancaKeepsOnFlying. https://t.co/nskmf8QRT7
Did you know we have a customer service account? Write to @AviancaEscucha and we will solve all your doubts. We will wait for you! https://t.co/7SpZmxHhW0

Do you know how to travel with your carry-on luggage? Learn more here: https://t.co/SsobsFeaz8. An A+ Passenger follows the weight restrictions and measures to avoid additional fees.  #AviancaKeepsOnFlying https://t.co/RWscGXAI6J

data.text: ¿Se acuerdan cuando nos veíamos así? 😏 Aquí les dejamos un #TBT con nuestro Boeing 747 ✈️. #CambiandoJuntos https://t.co/xqq3YWrgUF

data.text: Si viajas con tu mascota, es importante que conozcas las restricciones, instrucciones y cuidados que debes tener presente a la hora de viajar con tu amigo fiel. Conoce más en: https://t.co/JUY8rmMida. https://t.co/eGQ1tP5N6A

Do you know our Self Re-accommodation Service? Now you can choose another flight according to your needs. This service only applies if your flight was rescheduled by us. Our digital transformation #KeepsOnFlying. Learn more at: https://t.co/fIQliDjKrp. https://t.co/PHZcZzbZio
